If an exception is thrown in the body content of a tag, and this tag is wrapped around a , the JspWriter is not properly restored with Jasper2 (with our without pooling enabled). The example below fails to output properly anything sent to the JspWriter after the exception is thrown. Tested with tomcat 4.1.18 and JSTL 1.0.3 (currently the nightly of 'standard' at jakarta-taglibs). ----- <%@ taglib prefix="c" uri="http://java.sun.com/jstl/core" %> <%! public String throwEx() throws Exception { throw new java.lang.Exception("exception thrown by throwEx"); } %>

begin

<% throwEx(); %>

end
